translations: 使……变成玫瑰色；使（脸等）变红（rose 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: On the following morning he hastened to Rosings to pay his respects.
sentences.translation: 第二天上午，他赶快到罗新斯去拜会。

sentences.sentence: Scarcely any thing was talked of the whole day, or next morning, but their visit to Rosings.
sentences.translation: 这一整天和第二天上午，简直只谈到去罗新斯的事。

sentences.sentence: With an air of indifference he soon afterwards added, "How long did you say that he was at Rosings?"
sentences.translation: 他立刻又带着一副满不在乎的神气说道：“你刚刚说他在罗新斯待了多久？”
